name: CIG ADDICT
description:
you really need some cigs.

move around with the arrow keys to grab the cigs.

avoid the loss prevention agents who will chase you down, and get to the exit after collecting all the sweet, sweet nicotine.

10 levels

r to restart level, z to undo move

--
